DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date of skin response measurement(s) represented in an unambiguous date format (e.g., DD-MON-YYYY).

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record date of measurements using this format (DD-MON-YYYY).

ReferenceDocuments.name: SRDTC
ReferenceDocuments.description: This does not map directly to an SDTMIG variable. For the SDTM submission dataset, concatenate all collected CDASH DATE and TIME components and populate the SDTMIG variable SRDTC using the ISO 8601 format.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: The date of measurement can be determined from a collected date of the visit (VISDAT) and in such cases a separate measurement date field is not required.
